<<<<<<< HEAD
The history of the grand visiers, Mahomet and Achmet Coprogli, of the three last grand signiors, their Sultana's and chief favourites, with the most secret intrigues of the seraglio besides several other particulars of the wars of Dalmatia, Transylvania, Hungary, Candia, and Poland / Englished by John Evelyn, Junior. Histoire des grands vizirs Mahomet Caprogli-pacha et Achmet Caprogli-pacha. English Chassepol, François de, 17th cent. Evelyn, John, 1655-1699.
[8], 277 p.
Printed for H. Brome ..., London : 1677.
Translation of: Histoire des grands vizirs Mahomet Caprogli-pacha et Achmet Caprogli-pacha. Written by François de Chassepol. Cf. BN. "Licensed Nov. 24, 1676. Roger L'Estrange"--p. [7]. Reproduction of original in British Library.
=======
The history of the grand visiers, Mahomet and Achmet Coprogli, of the three last grand signiors, their Sultana's and chief favourites, with the most secret intrigues of the seraglio besides several other particulars of the wars of Dalmatia, Transylvania, Hungary, Candia, and Poland / Englished by John Evelyn, Junior. Histoire des grands vizirs Mahomet Caprogli-pacha et Achmet Caprogli-pacha. English Chassepol, François de, 17th cent. Evelyn, John, 1655-1699.
[8], 277 p.
Printed for H. Brome ..., London : 1677.
Translation of: Histoire des grands vizirs Mahomet Caprogli-pacha et Achmet Caprogli-pacha. Written by François de Chassepol. Cf. BN. "Licensed Nov. 24, 1676. Roger L'Estrange"--p. [7]. Reproduction of original in British Library.
H. Brome
